definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
revolving tray on a dining table/lazy Susan

sentences.english: The rotary bable can't rotate . There is too much torque.
sentences.chinese: 轉盤不能轉了，扭矩太大了。

sentences.english: Before you drop the bafl into the spinntng well, you bet a number on the layout.
sentences.chinese: 在你把小球投入轉盤之前，先在佈局上賭個號碼。

sentences.english: High & direction of Turnplate is adjustable and it is very convenient.
sentences.chinese: 轉盤的高度和方向可調，非常方便。

sentences.english: The roundabout there on Old Street is now called "Silicon Roundabout.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的老街上的街心轉盤現在被稱爲“硅盤”。

sentences.english: You're pushing him and that's different than steering something that is going to cause death into another.
sentences.chinese: 你推他和因爲轉盤導致其他死亡是大不相同的。

sentences.english: The planets are not attached to a turntable.
sentences.chinese: 行星畢竟並非連接着轉盤。

sentences.english: And so I started at the Big Wheel.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣我開始在“大轉盤”工作。

sentences.english: Applicable on rotating and sliding vertical injection molding machine.
sentences.chinese: 轉盤機或滑板機等多工位成型中水口料頭之夾取。

sentences.english: It looks like the dial only turns clockwise in either 3 or 4 increments.
sentences.chinese: 看起來這個轉盤只能按順時針方向轉3到4格。

sentences.english: They came to the Big Wheel next.
The turning disc is connected by a drive belt to an electric motor.
sentences.chinese: 轉盤由一根傳動帶與電機相連。

sentences.english: And they all hung out at the Big Wheel truck stop.
sentences.chinese: 而他們都在“大轉盤”卡車休息站消磨時光。

sentences.english: This setup shows the radius on the end of the rocker arm brackets being cut using the rotary table.
sentences.chinese: 這表明，半徑設置的結束搖臂括號被削減使用轉盤。

sentences.english: And the ball is attached to that disc with string.
sentences.chinese: 小球用繩子繫於轉盤上。

sentences.english: The very common Russian turntable is also using this principle.
sentences.chinese: 那種在裏很常見的俄羅斯轉盤也是利用這種原理。

sentences.english: Turntables can be installed to assist in the removal of the bogies to other maintenance areas.
sentences.chinese: 還應有轉向架轉盤將轉向架送到其他維修區域去。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to aim at/to target/to point at/to be directed at/registration/alignment (mechanical engineering)
iron panel/hot iron plate for fast grilling (Japanese: teppan)
